application.name: iContact
application.description:
iContact
iContact is an all-inclusive finger-friendly contact manager for Windows Mobile PocketPC phones. It's easily skinnable, intuitive, and replaces the standard Windows Mobile contact chooser.
Check http://www.supware.net/iContact for more info!
Release Notes:
0.91 - February 7, 2009
Fixed version number in Settings
Fixed click region in titlebar
Added option to display standard windows titlebar (thanks allelimo)
Now works with NON-PHONE WM5.0 devices
Fixed some bugs with empty contact list
